title: Public West Hollywood Teases a Return to Decadence at Site of Original Standard Hotel (Exclusive)
summary: The Sunset Strip hideaway from hotelier Ian Schrager opens its doors in spring 2026.

title: Amazon Offering Prime Members Access to Early ‘Wicked: For Good’ Screenings
summary: Amazon will host 'Prime Early Screening' events at select theaters on November 17 -- four days before the film hits theaters
